mapper.sql: id, empnum, reportid, creater, created, modifier, modified
mapper.delete: delete from bo_permission where empnum = #{empnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reportid = #{reportid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into bo_permission (empnum, reportid, creater, modifier) VALUES
(#{item.empnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reportid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
